resources.string: Quiz app
Enter your name, please!
Before submitting the answers, please agree on the following condition:
I hereby agree not to claim any prizes on completing the quiz. ;-)
1. Pick a number from 1 to 5!
2. How did Random Street get its name?
It\'s named after the famous systemphilosopher Johann Random
Every city has to have such street for statistical research purposes
The City Council could not choose between two other names
3. What celebrities have lived on Random Street?
(There may be more than one correct answer)
King Oscar VI
Karl Bookmaker
Johann Random
Ann Ybody
4. When the oldest house in Random Street is built?
5. The number of houses on the side of odd numbers...
is bigger that that on the side of even numbers
is the same as that on the side of even numbers
is smaller that that on the side of even numbers
depends on which end of the street the observer is watching from
6. What significant building will open on Random Street 2018?
The Random Theatre
The Random Hotel
The Random Object
Congratulations,
, your score is
out of 21 possible.
You\'re the most random person we\'ve ever met!
Your amount of random knowledge is impressive!
You\'ve shown perfectly random results on the random topic!
You may have some issues with randomness; however, is it really important?
Submit answers
Well, agree on the condition, please!
